text:
What if I organised a AD, minisymposium for juliacon (or even as a standalone online 1 day workshop).
Like a proper one,
• featuring an invited speaker from outside the community (I recon i could get one of the Dex folk to talk about “What do we really want from a general purpose language that supports AD”)
• short talks on the status of projects. (e.g. update on ChainRules)
• 1-2 longer talks (e.g. How to test AD. Why *is* mutating Source To Source reverse mode AD hard?) 
• A panel discussion
Since I am not organising the juliacon program, I have an itch.

short talks on the status of projects. (e.g. update on ChainRules)

mutating Source To Source reverse mode AD hard?)
Since I am not organising the juliacon program, I have an itch.

text: Dougal Maclaurin said he would happily be such an invited speaker for this.
